item.description:
• We have approximately 9-10 players but can accommodate a few more. Buy in is only $10 withÂ  no re-buys as it is a week night. This is a friendly, game of Texas Hold'em with people who have played before and know the basics.

    Also will be collecting $1 for our chip fund!

    Feel free to bring the beverage &/or munchies of your choice plus we will serve simple munchies.

    Hope you can make it.

    Darlene & Dave

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Poker Tournament-Texas Hold'em at the Rubinos, 2nd & 4th Wed of month
